languages.text: {n}Одобрительно хмыкнув, Октавиана бормочет:{/n} "Поверить не могу. Она и впрямь заманила на вечеринку Вольного Торговца. Если {mf|он|она} еще и выпьет за твое здоровье, я поверю, что ты и впрямь принцесса, а не ушлая контрабандистка. Присаживайтесь, Ваша Светлость".

{n}With an approving chuckle, Octaviana mutters,{/n} "I can't believe it. You actually roped the Rogue Trader into coming to your party. If the Rogue Trader raises a toast to your health, I'll start to believe you really are a princess, and not just a smuggler with the gift of the gab. Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Одобрительно хмыкнув, Октавиана бормочет:{/n} "Поверить не могу. Она и впрямь заманила на вечеринку Вольного Торговца. Если {mf|он|она} еще и выпьет за твое здоровье, я поверю, что ты и впрямь принцесса, а не ушлая контрабандистка. Присаживайтесь, Ваша Светлость".

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜发出了赞许的笑声，自言自语道。{/n}“我真不敢相信，你居然真的能把行商浪人哄骗到你的聚会上来。如果行商浪人能举杯为你的健康干杯，那我或许真的会相信你是位公主，而不仅仅是个油嘴滑舌的走私者。请坐吧，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}With an approving chuckle, Octaviana mutters,{/n} "I can't believe it. You actually roped the Rogue Trader into coming to your party. If the Rogue Trader raises a toast to your health, I'll start to believe you really are a princess, and not just a smuggler with the gift of the gab. Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜发出了赞许的笑声，自言自语道。{/n}“我真不敢相信，你居然真的能把行商浪人哄骗到你的聚会上来。如果行商浪人能举杯为你的健康干杯，那我或许真的会相信你是位公主，而不仅仅是个油嘴滑舌的走私者。请坐吧，大人。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}笑いをこらえながら、オクタヴィアナはつぶやく{/n}「信じられません。自由開拓者をパーティーに誘ったなんて。自由開拓者があなたの健康を祝して乾杯したら、あなたは本当に王女で、口が達者なだけの密輸人ではないと信じ始めるわ。さあ、陛下、どうぞお座りくださいな」
languages.original_text: {n}With an approving chuckle, Octaviana mutters,{/n} "I can't believe it. You actually roped the Rogue Trader into coming to your party. If the Rogue Trader raises a toast to your health, I'll start to believe you really are a princess, and not just a smuggler with the gift of the gab. Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}笑いをこらえながら、オクタヴィアナはつぶやく{/n}「信じられません。自由開拓者をパーティーに誘ったなんて。自由開拓者があなたの健康を祝して乾杯したら、あなたは本当に王女で、口が達者なだけの密輸人ではないと信じ始めるわ。さあ、陛下、どうぞお座りくださいな」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Con una risa de aprobación, Octaviana murmura:{/n} «No me lo puedo creer. Has conseguido convencer a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de que venga a tu fiesta. Como brinde por tu salud, voy a empezar a creerme que eres una princesa de verdad y no una contrabandista con mucha labia. Siéntese, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}With an approving chuckle, Octaviana mutters,{/n} "I can't believe it. You actually roped the Rogue Trader into coming to your party. If the Rogue Trader raises a toast to your health, I'll start to believe you really are a princess, and not just a smuggler with the gift of the gab. Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una risa de aprobación, Octaviana murmura:{/n} «No me lo puedo creer. Has conseguido convencer a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente de que venga a tu fiesta. Como brinde por tu salud, voy a empezar a creerme que eres una princesa de verdad y no una contrabandista con mucha labia. Siéntese, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Avec un petit rire approbateur, Octaviana marmonne :{/n} « J'en reviens pas que tu aies réussi à convaincre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'assister à ta fête. {mf|S'il|Si elle} trinque à ta santé, je veux bien commencer à croire que tu es une vraie princesse et pas juste une passeuse avec un sacré bagout. Je vous en prie, prenez place, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}With an approving chuckle, Octaviana mutters,{/n} "I can't believe it. You actually roped the Rogue Trader into coming to your party. If the Rogue Trader raises a toast to your health, I'll start to believe you really are a princess, and not just a smuggler with the gift of the gab. Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un petit rire approbateur, Octaviana marmonne :{/n} « J'en reviens pas que tu aies réussi à convaincre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} d'assister à ta fête. {mf|S'il|Si elle} trinque à ta santé, je veux bien commencer à croire que tu es une vraie princesse et pas juste une passeuse avec un sacré bagout. Je vous en prie, prenez place, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana kichert zustimmend und murmelt:{/n} "Ich kann es nicht fassen. Ihr habt es wirklich geschafft, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zur Feier kommt. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|Freihändlerin} jetzt noch auf Eure Gesundheit anstößt, glaube ich wirklich, dass Ihr eine Prinzessin und nicht nur irgendeine Schmugglerin mit losem Mundwerk seid. Bitte nehmt Platz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}With an approving chuckle, Octaviana mutters,{/n} "I can't believe it. You actually roped the Rogue Trader into coming to your party. If the Rogue Trader raises a toast to your health, I'll start to believe you really are a princess, and not just a smuggler with the gift of the gab. Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana kichert zustimmend und murmelt:{/n} "Ich kann es nicht fassen. Ihr habt es wirklich geschafft, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zur Feier kommt. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|Freihändlerin} jetzt noch auf Eure Gesundheit anstößt, glaube ich wirklich, dass Ihr eine Prinzessin und nicht nur irgendeine Schmugglerin mit losem Mundwerk seid. Bitte nehmt Platz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, onaylar bir edayla gülümseyerek konuşuyor.{/n} "Buna inanamıyorum. Hür Tacir'i gerçekten de partine çekmeyi becermişsin. Hür Tacir sağlığına kadeh kaldırırsa senin gerçekten de gevezelik üstadı bir kaçakçı değil de bir prenses olduğuna inanmaya başlayacağım. Lütfen oturun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."

Please take a seat, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana
